name: Chromeclaw
description: A hulking brute built for street brawls, Chromeclaw's augmented limbs are scarred from countless fights in the underbelly of Neo-Shanghai. His worn leather jacket hangs loose over his cybernetic chestplate, and a permanent sneer twists his lips as he scans for marks.
dialogue: You look like trouble.
Give me your creds or I'll take 'em!
Don't try anything funny. My chrome ain't just for show.
Who do you think you are, huh?
Step aside before I crack your skull!
You gonna fight? Let's go then!
I don't take kindly to trespassers.
This is my turf. Get outta here.
What the hell are ya lookin' at?!
Come on, punk! Make my day!
Your kind ain't welcome here.
You reek of corporate chrome. Stay away from me.
I've seen your type before - a rat sniffing around for scraps.
Don't even think about touching that!
Where you gonna run to when I catch ya?
My patience is wearing thin, friend.
You want a piece of Chromeclaw? Fine by me!
I ain't afraid of nobody. Not even the corp dogs.
This glitch zone's my playground now.
Don't you ever forget it.
Ya got somethin' to say, smarty?
You think you can handle me? Try me.
Keep your hands where I can see 'em!
Look at that shiny hardware. Must be expensive...
Gimme a reason not to rip it off ya.
What are you doing here?!
This ain't no tourist trap.
You gotta pay to play in this district, pal.
Step up or step out!
I don't like strangers around here. Especially not ones with your kind of chrome.
Don't try any tricks on me. I know the game better than you do.
You think you can just walk in and take what you want?
Think again.
Let me tell ya somethin', kid: This city is rotten to the core.
And so are we who live here.
Don't pretend like you're better than us.
You reek of privilege. Get outta my sight!
Where's your handler? Send 'em over, I got a message for him.
My boys saw what ya did back there. Pay up or face the consequences.
Don't make me come after you.
I know where you live.
You think you can hide from Chromeclaw?
Think again.
This district is a mess, and it needs cleaning up... starting with ya!
Where are the other glitches? Show yourself!
Are you afraid of me?!
Prove your worth. Fight me!
You're nothin' but a corporate puppet.
And I'm gonna break every string that binds you!

flavor.rationale: Chromeclaw controls a small territory in the Glitch Area, using his brute strength and cybernetic enhancements to extort money from anyone who dares enter. He thrives on the chaos of the leaking Matrix and preys on those destabilized by it.
